titlestmt.titleproper: Account book containing a coin collection inventory, begins 1834
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Account book containing a coin collection inventory
did.abstract: Account book containing an inventory of an unknown coin collector’s collection.
did.physloc: Rare Book Room - Pamphlet - Folio - HE-Z

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Account book containing an inventory of an unknown coin collector’s collection. Includes an index. There is a label on the cover that says, “Family Expenses &c Book 2, Commencing Sept. 9th, 1834.”

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Account book containing a coin collection inventory, begins 1834, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
